metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42321 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Xenstore: Guests can crash xenstored via exhausting the stack Xenstored isusing recursion for some Xenstore operations (e.g. for deleting a sub-treeof Xenstore nodes). With sufficiently deep nesting levels this can resultin stack exhaustion on xenstored, leading to a crash of xenstored.

criterions.comment: xen package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
